Package fr.upmc.datacenter.software.step3.largescalecoordination.tests

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TestCooperationLargeScale
    This class shows a test of hosting two ApplicationContainer In this case we use 3 Computer in our data center means that we can allocate 2 Processor with 3 Cores and the ApplicationVM allocate 4 cores to execute the received requests.
    TestRingNetworkCoordination
    This class shows a test of hosting two ApplicationContainer In this case we use 2 Computer in our data center means that we can allocate 4 Processor with 2 Cores or we can say that the ApplicationVM reserve 4 cores to execute the received requests.
